headline:
Fluidigm Introduces Advanced Mass Cytometry System Along With Sample
Barcoding for Markedly Improved Discovery Workflows

Fluidigm's New Helios Platform Combines Ease-of-Use Enhancements with
Multi-Modal Capabilities for High-Resolution, High-Content Single-Cell Biology
content:
Copyright 2015 Business Wire, Inc.
                                 Business Wire

                      June 25, 2015 Thursday 12:00 PM GMT




BODY:

Fluidigm also announced proteomics sample barcoding, which enables Helios and
all other CyTOF customers to take advantage of multiplexing in their
experimental design. Fluidigm's new barcoding reagent kit accommodates the
unique barcoding of up to 20 samples such that they can be combined, stained and
acquired as one multiplexed sample. Multiplexing improves data quality as
samples are ...

...preparation through data collection. It substantially increases throughput by
reducing staining protocol and instrument collection time. Barcoding is
indispensable for any experiment where unraveling of biological complexity
requires multiple samples, time points and assay conditions.

"The Helios platform and sample barcoding deliver significant improvements to
performance, ease-of-use, and data quality to our customers, providing more
parametric information from a single ...

...Helios systems in the third quarter of 2015.

the 30th Congress of the International Society for Advancement of Cytometry
being held this week in Glasgow, ...
